name: Groot Slang (Grootslang)
shortLoreBlurb: Groot Slang (Grootslang) is a monster from South Africa associated with serpent-elephant, caves. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom.
description: Groot Slang (Grootslang) is a monster from South Africa associated with serpent-elephant, caves. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom.
